scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && npm run copy:configs
scripts.build-to-tutoron: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --outDir '/home/vladimir/dev/sources/tutoron/node_modules/@vzh/react-auth/' && copyfiles package.json '/home/vladimir/dev/sources/tutoron/node_modules/@vzh/react-auth/'
scripts.build-to-pwa: npm run clean && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json --outDir '/home/vladimir/dev/sources/pwa/node_modules/@vzh/react-auth/' && copyfiles package.json '/home/vladimir/dev/sources/pwa/node_modules/@vzh/react-auth/'
scripts.patch-publish: npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish ./dist/ && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-publish: npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish ./dist/ && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-publish: npm version major && npm run build && npm publish ./dist/ && git push --follow-tags
